summary: In a future Singapore, CyberLink is used for communication (sometimes virtual reality), monetary transaction and records of all citizens. Headhunter Dash is commissioned to find Edward Chan. Why are so many interested in him?
cast: Genevieve O'Reilly|Luoyong Wang|Kay Siu Lim|David Warner|Joan Chen|Michael De Mesa|Henry O|Remesh Panicker|William Sanderson|T. keywords: cyberspace|cyberpunk|reference to virtual reality|female protagonist|one word title
title: Cyber Wars
